heisigComment: * The related image of wings can be added as a primitive meaning. It can also take the form ョョ when used as a primitive, as we shall see in frames 618 and 619.
heisigStory: From the pictograph of two bird-wings, we get feathers.
koohiiStory2: These days the biggest concern in airline safety is ICE on the WINGS of the plane. Birds that fly long distances also have to worry about getting ICE on their FEATHERS.
myStory: lông. cánh. hai cái cánh có lông
words:
羽(はね): feather, wing
羽根(はね): shuttlecock
